name: openemr
description: The most popular open source electronic health records and medical practice management solution (deployed via Docker)
notes: OpenEMR is a web-based application, not a CLI tool
Installation deploys OpenEMR via official Docker image
A CLI wrapper script is created at /usr/local/bin/openemr for container management
Access OpenEMR web interface at http://localhost:80 after running 'openemr start'
Docker daemon must be running for OpenEMR to function
